channel.title: Compiler Won't Work!
channel.description:
Ok I am trying to start up a server for me and my friend to hang out in.
I am using Allstar-Scape v2. The problem is the dang compiler won't work!!
I have JDK #6 update 11. Every time I try to compile it it says: The system could not find the path specified. Please press any key to continue...
My CLASSPATH is: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%; My PATH is: C:\Sun\JDK\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.011\bin My compiler code thingy is:
@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
I am running on Windows vista I don't know if that matters or not

item.title: Compiler Won't Work!
item.dc:creator: @swordslam46 swordslam46
item.description:
@swordslam46 wrote:

It still won’t work. After I downloaded JKD did I need to do anything special to it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2008, 09:52:28 pm[/size][hr]anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2008, 10:00:18 pm[/size][hr]Please help! I need this up before New Years[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2008, 10:03:44 pm[/size][hr]OK I clicked my JDK and I need to install something from it! However, every time it reaches 2% it restarts

I just deleted my JDK so maybe that will work if I reinstall it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2008, 11:01:36 pm[/size][hr]Why wont anyone reply?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

Try taking C:\Sun\SDK\bin; out on PATH

item.title: Compiler Won't Work!
item.dc:creator: @swordslam46 swordslam46
item.description:
@swordslam46 wrote:

Ok I am trying to start up a server for me and my friend to hang out in.

I am using Allstar-Scape v2. The problem is the dang compiler won’t work!!

I have JDK #6 update 11. Every time I try to compile it it says: The system could not find the path specified. Please press any key to continue…

My CLASSPATH is: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
My PATH is: C:\Sun\JDK\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.011\bin
My compiler code thingy is:

@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

I am running on Windows vista I don’t know if that matters or not

Read full topic
